website_summaries.verdict: A sizable bag filled with soft freeze-dried chunks of premium pork raised without antibiotics, hormones, or steroids for an excellent all-natural exotic snack.
pros: Pork heart is the first of 3 ingredients, alongside honey and sea salt
For dogs, but cats enjoy them as well
Small bites for all types of cats at most life stages

customer_reviews.title: Good, But Not Cold.
customer_reviews.text: My kitten liked these, but we had to break them into thirds as they were too difficult for him to eat whole. I froze most of the package since it required refrigeration and I could not imagine a kitten managing his way through this bag in 2 weeks time. Side note - kitten does not enjoy them cold, so straight from the fridge is not ideal (he eats his regular wet food cold since we have to refrigerate the can portions, so not sure what the problem is).
customer_reviews.author: S. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves them and that’s what counts with me.
customer_reviews.author: Dozer's mom

customer_reviews.title: The perfect snack 🐾
customer_reviews.text: She cannot get enough of this—and it’s good for her!
customer_reviews.author: Real People

customer_reviews.title: Good Qaulity Treat for Dogs or Cats
customer_reviews.text: Our two dogs love these treats. They are a very good quality treat. I wish they came in large size bags, 4oz bags do not last long.which keeps me reordering them.
customer_reviews.author: Shalecreek LLC

customer_reviews.title: Buy Multiple Bags - DOG WILL LOVE THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: My pug LOVED these treats. Doesn't surprise me though as PRIMAL is her choice in dog food as well. I would suggest buying multiple packages because your dog will LOVE them as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: KAB

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: My dog considers this her super reward (for coming to me when she is in the back yard barking at squirrels). I will buy these again
customer_reviews.author: doris c.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Treat
customer_reviews.text: My dachshund loves the beef nibs. I put them in a kong type bone and he does not leave the bone until he has gotten all of the nibs out of the bone.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee M

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: We love primal treats however the items that were shipped to me were completely dried out and hard as a rock. Unfortunately we are not able to return and I ordered 7 packages and now I lost roughly $50. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only treats that we've found so far that our dog loves!
customer_reviews.author: msalmi78

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it but not cheap
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it but not cheap. At this price point, we have actually switched to buying jerky/treats for human to feed them :).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Primal Pork Nibs
product_meta.description: All Primal Treats are made from single source proteins and offer a healthy choice for all pets, especially those with food allergies. Our treats are produced using low-temperature, slow cooking techniques such as freeze-drying and slow roasting, yielding high-density nutrition in a shelf-stable product. We recommend using our treats as a snack alternative, as well as for training and obedience rewards.
feature_bullets: Our Treats Are Available In A Variety Of Cooking Styles, As Well As Protein Sources Including Venison, Buffalo, Turkey And Chicken.
All Primal Treats Are Produced Using Usda Meats, Poultry And Game Raised In The United States And New Zealand Without Antibiotics Or Added Hormones
Single-Source Proteins And Offer A Healthy Choice For All Pets, Especially Those With Food Allergies.
